clueList.clueInfo: Need the true cure and enter the passcode (4 digits):
clueList.clueDetail: You can find the rest of the pages in the safe. They should be able to convince the villagers.

Information literacy is a set of abilities requiring individuals to recognize when information is needed and have the ability to locate, evaluate, and use effectively the needed information. Think about:
Time Lines:
Truth is always changing. consider the publication date and whether the information is up-to-date and relevant now.
Source Credibility: assess the reputation, authority, and qualifications of the sources, as well as any potential conflicts of interest.

clueList.clueInfo: You found a notebook in the chest. It is the working records of Dr. Green.
clueList.clueDetail:
I don't know why the villagers thought Lifespring is a medicine for immortality. That's funny because I create this medicine trying to save my daugter from the Insomnia. Maybe this record could clear their doubts. I must publish it somehow...

(---I understand now, those people who are gathering upstairs are comming for the medicine. I can use this notebook to convince them so they will leave and so can I.)

clueList.clueInfo: There is a diary under the bed.

clueDetail.08/18/2010: I usually do not keep a diary, but I can not sleep today so I decide to write it now.
clueDetail.08/22/2010: Dad says there is a medicine might help me fall asleep. I hope that would work because I have not slept for days. Dad says it is called Lifespring. I like the name of it.
clueDetail.08/24/2010: I made a new friend today. His name is Bear.
clueDetail.09/05/1010: It is my birthday today, but dad is so busy with his thing. Bear says we should steal the portion and stop him from working, so he can spend time with me. I refused but Bear did it anyway. I locked the pages into my safe, using the code I saw on the bottle.

clueList.clueInfo: This is the door to the hallway.
clueList.clueDetail: There must be clues here that can help me understand what is going on outside.

clueList.clueInfo: This seems to be Dr.Green's diary, but the last a few pages are missing.

clueDetail.08/22/2010: Alina can finally fall asleep now after I gave her the Lifespring. But I am worried about the side effects.
clueDetail.08/25/2010: Alina takes Lifespring everyday, but her sleeping hours are getting shorter and shorter. I am afraid it will stop working in a few days.
clueDetail.09/05/2010:
Today I acciedentally mixed the Infinity and Lifespring. The new portion displays some characteristics that can overcome the obstales! I put on a label and mark it as A2125, since it is the combination of the two. I hope this will work.
I also need to wirte something for Ms.White so she can publish it and the villagers would stop believing I am making some kind of immortality drugs. Actually, I will just write here now so I do not forget.......
The rest of the pages were missing.

clueList.clueInfo: It's a dressing table. A mysterious bottle is inside.
clueList.clueDetail: The bottle has purple fluid in it. The label is hard to read.

clueList.clueInfo: Some portions are on the table. I can recognize the Infinity portion I saw before.
clueList.clueDetail: The bottle has blue fluid in it. The label shows A25. I remember this code stands for Infinity.

clueList.clueInfo: Some portions are here. I can recognize the Lifespring portion I saw before.
clueList.clueDetail: The bottle has pink fluid in it. The label shows A21. I remember this code stands for LifeSpring.

hint: It seems to be Dr. Green's daughter's room.
